the number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births—are shown in this report by age group 
and race and Hispanic origin.
This report updates a previous one that showed maternal mortality rates for 2018–2022 (2). In 
2023, 669 women died of maternal causes in the United States, compared with 817 in 2022 (2)
